sentences.en: " Hmm, if she found that out -- "
sentences.cn: “ 哼, 这话要给她知道了 —— ”

sentences.en: At the second phase, several speech recognition algorithms including the DTW and HMM, are thoroughly discussed.
sentences.cn: 其次, 着重讨论了语音识别中常用的两种识别方法:基于模板匹配的DTW和基于统计模型的HMM在 语音识别中的应用.

sentences.en: Hmm . Yes, you have a slight temperature.
Hmm, I play badminton, table tennis and volleyball, and I go swimming and roller - skating.
sentences.cn: 喔, 我打羽毛球 、 乒乓球和排球, 并且我也游泳和滑旱冰.

sentences.en: Hmm, shall I call you Catherine or Kate?
sentences.cn: 嗯, 我叫你凯瑟琳还是凯特 呢 ?

sentences.en: Hmm, Wang Tao. He's so tall and plays basketball really well.
sentences.cn: 啊, 王涛. 他真高,篮球也打得很好.

sentences.en: In this paper , we propose an artificial emotion model based on HMM.
sentences.cn: 提出一种基于HMM的人工情感模型.

sentences.en: In this paper, HMM is applied to distinguish Wake , REM and S 2 by one channel EEG.
sentences.cn: 用隐马尔可夫模型(HMM) 从单导睡眠脑电中区分W期 、 REM期 和S2期.

sentences.en: Let me see, hmm. I'll take this pair.
sentences.cn: 让我看看. 哦,我就要这双.

sentences.en: Mmm - hmm. It is a very bright pink.
sentences.cn: 是的这种粉红是亮了点.

sentences.en: Mmm - hmm. That's because he's sleeping.
sentences.cn: 嗯. 那是因为他睡了.

sentences.en: So you're a soy - burger - making , vegetarian delivery boy, hmm?
sentences.cn: 这么说就是做做素菜汉堡然后送送外卖喽?

sentences.en: Source codes used in Hidden Markov Model ( HMM ) complete source code, has been tested.
sentences.cn: 源代码中使用隐马尔可夫模型 ( HMM ) 完整的源代码, 已经过测试.

sentences.en: The revised HMM parameter re - estimating algorithm is more stable effective, and the overflow problem is eliminated.
sentences.cn: 该算法降低了HMM参数 重估算法的计算复杂度,提高了稳定性, 避免了溢出问题.

sentences.en: This paper presents a method of multi - Gaussian mixture modeling and selecting based HMM speech synthesis.
sentences.cn: 本文介绍了一种基于多高斯建模和挑选的HMM语音合成方法.
